title: Define Base Molecule Libraries
description: Create and document libraries of essential base molecules required for various meals.

title: Design Meal Synthesis Algorithms
description: Develop algorithms to combine base molecules into specific dishes with their respective nutritional balances.

title: Implement Base Molecule Storage System
description: Design and develop a storage system for base molecules, ensuring optimal shelf life and safe handling.

title: Develop User Interface for Selection and Ordering
description: Design and implement an intuitive user interface for users to select dishes and order synthesis.

title: Create Recipe Database
description: Set up a database to store various recipes and nutritional information.

title: Implement Meal Synthesis System
description: Develop and integrate the synthesis system with the defined algorithms and base molecule libraries.

title: Perform Unit Tests for Synthesis System
description: Test each component of the synthesis system individually to ensure correct functionality.

title: Integration Tests for Complete System
description: Test the complete FoodSynthesizer system to ensure all components work together.
dependencies: Perform Unit Tests for Synthesis System

title: Document User Manual and API Reference for FoodSynthesizer
description: Write clear documentation for users to operate the FoodSynthesizer safely, troubleshoot common issues, and experiment with various recipes. Additionally, provide an API reference detailing all available endpoints, methods, parameters, and responses for developers to integrate with external applications.
